<div id="game-container" style="position: relative; width: 100%; max-width: 800px; height: 400px; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #87CEEB 0%, #E0F6FF 100%); border-radius: 12px; overflow: hidden; margin: 0 auto;">

<canvas id="gameCanvas" width="800" height="400" style="display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%;"></canvas>

<div id="game-ui" style="position: absolute; top: 10px; left: 10px; color: white; font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);">

<div style="margin-bottom: 10px;">
  <span>Score: </span><span id="score" style="font-weight: bold; color: #FFD700;">0</span>
</div>

<div style="margin-bottom: 10px;">
  <span>High Score: </span><span id="highScore" style="font-weight: bold; color: #FF6B6B;">0</span>
</div>

<button id="startBtn" onclick="startGame()" style="background: #E52521; color: white; border: 3px solid #8B4513; border-radius: 8px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5); box-shadow: 0 4px 0 #8B4513;">
  START GAME
</button>

<div id="gameOver" style="display: none; position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); text-align: center; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); padding: 30px; border-radius: 12px; border: 3px solid #E52521;">
  <div style="font-size: 32px; font-weight: bold; color: #E52521; margin-bottom: 20px; text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);">GAME OVER</div>
  <div style="margin-bottom: 10px; color: #FFD700;">Score: <span id="finalScore">0</span></div>
  <button onclick="restartGame()" style="background: #E52521; color: white; border: 3px solid #8B4513; border-radius: 8px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer;">
    PLAY AGAIN
  </button>
</div>

<div id="instructions" style="position: absolute; bottom: 10px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); text-align: center; color: white; font-size: 14px; text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);">
  Press SPACE or Click to Jump | Collect Coins, Avoid Enemies!
</div>

</div>

</div>

<style>
@keyframes coinSpin {
  0%, 100% { transform: scaleX(1); }
  50% { transform: scaleX(0.1); }
}

#game-container:hover {
  box-shadow: 0 8px 30px rgba(135, 206, 235, 0.4);
}

#startBtn:hover {
  background: #FF4444;
  box-shadow: 0 6px 0 #8B4513;
}

#startBtn:active {
  transform: scale(0.95);
}
</style>

<script>
(function() {
  'use strict';

  const canvas = document.getElementById('gameCanvas');
  const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

  // Game state
  let gameRunning = false;
  let score = 0;
  let highScore = localStorage.getItem('marioHighScore') || 0;
  let gameSpeed = 3;
  let animationId;

  // Update high score display
  document.getElementById('highScore').textContent = highScore;

  // Player (Mario)
  const player = {
    x: 100,
    y: 280,
    width: 30,
    height: 40,
    velocityY: 0,
    gravity: 0.6,
    jumpPower: -12,
    isJumping: false,

    draw() {
      // Body (red)
      ctx.fillStyle = '#E52521';
      ctx.fillRect(this.x, this.y, this.width, this.height);

      // Face (skin)
      ctx.fillStyle = '#FFD0B0';
      ctx.fillRect(this.x + 5, this.y + 5, this.width - 10, 15);

      // Hat
      ctx.fillStyle = '#E52521';
      ctx.fillRect(this.x + 3, this.y - 5, this.width - 6, 8);

      // Eyes
      ctx.fillStyle = 'black';
      ctx.fillRect(this.x + 8, this.y + 10, 4, 4);
      ctx.fillRect(this.x + 18, this.y + 10, 4, 4);

      // Mustache
      ctx.fillStyle = '#8B4513';
      ctx.fillRect(this.x + 7, this.y + 17, 16, 3);

      // Legs
      ctx.fillStyle = '#4169E1';
      ctx.fillRect(this.x + 5, this.y + this.height - 10, 8, 10);
      ctx.fillRect(this.x + 17, this.y + this.height - 10, 8, 10);
    },

    jump() {
      if (!this.isJumping) {
        this.velocityY = this.jumpPower;
        this.isJumping = true;
      }
    },

    update() {
      this.velocityY += this.gravity;
      this.y += this.velocityY;

      // Ground collision
      if (this.y + this.height > 330) {
        this.y = 330 - this.height;
        this.velocityY = 0;
        this.isJumping = false;
      }
    }
  };

  // Game objects
  let obstacles = [];
  let coins = [];
  let enemies = [];
  let clouds = [];

  // Initialize clouds
  for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
    clouds.push({
      x: Math.random() * canvas.width,
      y: Math.random() * 100 + 20,
      width: Math.random() * 80 + 60,
      speed: Math.random() * 0.5 + 0.2
    });
  }

  // Spawn obstacle
  function spawnObstacle() {
    if (!gameRunning) return;

    const type = Math.random();

    if (type < 0.3) {
      // Coin
      coins.push({
        x: canvas.width,
        y: Math.random() * 100 + 220,
        width: 20,
        height: 20,
        rotation: 0
      });
    } else if (type < 0.7) {
      // Enemy (Goomba-style)
      enemies.push({
        x: canvas.width,
        y: 290,
        width: 35,
        height: 40,
        frame: 0
      });
    } else {
      // Pipe obstacle
      obstacles.push({
        x: canvas.width,
        y: 280,
        width: 30,
        height: 50
      });
    }

    setTimeout(spawnObstacle, 2000 / (gameSpeed / 3));
  }

  // Draw functions
  function drawBackground() {
    // Sky gradient
    const gradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, 0, 0, canvas.height);
    gradient.addColorStop(0, '#87CEEB');
    gradient.addColorStop(1, '#E0F6FF');
    ctx.fillStyle = gradient;
    ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);

    // Clouds
    ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)';
    clouds.forEach(cloud => {
      cloud.x -= cloud.speed;
      if (cloud.x + cloud.width < 0) {
        cloud.x = canvas.width;
      }

      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.arc(cloud.x, cloud.y, 20, 0, Math.PI * 2);
      ctx.arc(cloud.x + 25, cloud.y - 10, 25, 0, Math.PI * 2);
      ctx.arc(cloud.x + 50, cloud.y, 20, 0, Math.PI * 2);
      ctx.fill();
    });

    // Ground
    ctx.fillStyle = '#8B4513';
    ctx.fillRect(0, 330, canvas.width, 70);

    // Grass
    ctx.fillStyle = '#228B22';
    ctx.fillRect(0, 330, canvas.width, 5);
  }

  function drawObstacles() {
    ctx.fillStyle = '#228B22';
    obstacles.forEach(obs => {
      obs.x -= gameSpeed;

      // Pipe body
      ctx.fillStyle = '#228B22';
      ctx.fillRect(obs.x, obs.y, obs.width, obs.height);

      // Pipe top
      ctx.fillStyle = '#32CD32';
      ctx.fillRect(obs.x - 5, obs.y, obs.width + 10, 10);
    });

    // Remove off-screen obstacles
    obstacles = obstacles.filter(obs => obs.x + obs.width > 0);
  }

  function drawCoins() {
    coins.forEach(coin => {
      coin.x -= gameSpeed;
      coin.rotation += 0.1;

      ctx.save();
      ctx.translate(coin.x + coin.width / 2, coin.y + coin.height / 2);
      ctx.rotate(Math.sin(coin.rotation) * 0.3);
      ctx.scale(Math.cos(coin.rotation), 1);

      // Coin
      ctx.fillStyle = '#FFD700';
      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.ellipse(0, 0, coin.width / 2, coin.height / 2, 0, 0, Math.PI * 2);
      ctx.fill();

      // Inner circle
      ctx.fillStyle = '#FFA500';
      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.ellipse(0, 0, coin.width / 3, coin.height / 3, 0, 0, Math.PI * 2);
      ctx.fill();

      ctx.restore();
    });

    // Remove off-screen coins
    coins = coins.filter(coin => coin.x + coin.width > 0);
  }

  function drawEnemies() {
    enemies.forEach(enemy => {
      enemy.x -= gameSpeed;
      enemy.frame++;

      // Body (brown)
      ctx.fillStyle = '#8B4513';
      ctx.fillRect(enemy.x, enemy.y, enemy.width, enemy.height);

      // Face
      ctx.fillStyle = '#D2691E';
      ctx.fillRect(enemy.x + 5, enemy.y + 5, enemy.width - 10, enemy.height - 15);

      // Eyes (angry)
      ctx.fillStyle = 'white';
      ctx.fillRect(enemy.x + 8, enemy.y + 8, 8, 8);
      ctx.fillRect(enemy.x + 19, enemy.y + 8, 8, 8);
      ctx.fillStyle = 'black';
      ctx.fillRect(enemy.x + 10, enemy.y + 10, 4, 4);
      ctx.fillRect(enemy.x + 21, enemy.y + 10, 4, 4);

      // Eyebrows
      ctx.fillStyle = '#8B4513';
      ctx.fillRect(enemy.x + 7, enemy.y + 6, 9, 2);
      ctx.fillRect(enemy.x + 19, enemy.y + 6, 9, 2);

      // Feet
      ctx.fillStyle = '#4169E1';
      const footOffset = Math.floor(enemy.frame / 10) % 2 === 0 ? 0 : 3;
      ctx.fillRect(enemy.x + 5, enemy.y + enemy.height - 8, 10, 8);
      ctx.fillRect(enemy.x + 20, enemy.y + enemy.height - 8 + footOffset, 10, 8);
    });

    // Remove off-screen enemies
    enemies = enemies.filter(enemy => enemy.x + enemy.width > 0);
  }

  function checkCollisions() {
    // Coin collision
    coins = coins.filter(coin => {
      if (player.x < coin.x + coin.width &&
          player.x + player.width > coin.x &&
          player.y < coin.y + coin.height &&
          player.y + player.height > coin.y) {
        score += 10;
        document.getElementById('score').textContent = score;
        return false;
      }
      return true;
    });

    // Obstacle collision
    for (let obs of obstacles) {
      if (player.x + 5 < obs.x + obs.width &&
          player.x + player.width - 5 > obs.x &&
          player.y + 5 < obs.y + obs.height &&
          player.y + player.height - 5 > obs.y) {
        gameOver();
        return;
      }
    }

    // Enemy collision
    for (let enemy of enemies) {
      if (player.x + 5 < enemy.x + enemy.width &&
          player.x + player.width - 5 > enemy.x &&
          player.y + 5 < enemy.y + enemy.height &&
          player.y + player.height - 5 > enemy.y) {
        gameOver();
        return;
      }
    }
  }

  function gameOver() {
    gameRunning = false;
    cancelAnimationFrame(animationId);

    if (score > highScore) {
      highScore = score;
      localStorage.setItem('marioHighScore', highScore);
      document.getElementById('highScore').textContent = highScore;
    }

    document.getElementById('finalScore').textContent = score;
    document.getElementById('gameOver').style.display = 'block';
  }

  function gameLoop() {
    if (!gameRunning) return;

    ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);

    drawBackground();
    drawObstacles();
    drawCoins();
    drawEnemies();

    player.update();
    player.draw();

    checkCollisions();

    // Increase difficulty
    if (score > 0 && score % 100 === 0) {
      gameSpeed = Math.min(gameSpeed + 0.2, 10);
    }

    animationId = requestAnimationFrame(gameLoop);
  }

  // Start game
  window.startGame = function() {
    if (gameRunning) return;

    // Reset
    gameRunning = true;
    score = 0;
    gameSpeed = 3;
    obstacles = [];
    coins = [];
    enemies = [];
    player.y = 280;
    player.velocityY = 0;

    document.getElementById('score').textContent = score;
    document.getElementById('gameOver').style.display = 'none';
    document.getElementById('startBtn').style.display = 'none';

    spawnObstacle();
    gameLoop();
  };

  // Restart game
  window.restartGame = function() {
    document.getElementById('gameOver').style.display = 'none';
    startGame();
  };

  // Jump controls
  document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
    if (e.code === 'Space') {
      e.preventDefault();
      if (gameRunning) {
        player.jump();
      }
    }
  });

  canvas.addEventListener('click', () => {
    if (gameRunning) {
      player.jump();
    }
  });

  canvas.addEventListener('touchstart', (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    if (gameRunning) {
      player.jump();
    }
  });

})();
</script>
:::

## How to Play

::: {.glass-card}

- **Desktop:** Press **SPACE** or **Click** to jump
- **Mobile:** **Tap** anywhere on the screen

Collect yellow coins for points, avoid green pipes and brown enemies!
:::

::: {.glass-card}

- Time your jumps carefully to clear obstacles
- Collect coins to boost your score
- Difficulty increases as you progress
